scenario_text.value:
Takuma... What’re you doing here? Did you...
I dunno, come to see me or something?
Well... Yeah, I guess you could say that.

What a coinkydink! I actually came over
hoping to run into you, too.

Huh? You came...to see me? About what,
exactly?
I wanted to say thanks.

Say thanks...? What’ve I done worth thanking
me for?

You talked me through that stuff with Aoi,
right? Things are good now, thanks to that.

Actually, we got super close while you were
gone. We’re, like, best friends now!

Oh yeah? That’s great to hear! You two
finally worked things out...
Yeah... So thanks for listening, Takuma.

(Saki looks so happy... I can’t help smiling
when I look at her.)
So? What did you want from me?

Don’t tell me you just wanted a glimpse of
this pretty face... Ha, as if!

Well, um... There was just something I wanted
to ask, without the others around...

Takuma... What are you doing? Were you
looking to run into me or something?
Yeah, I guess you could say that.

What a coincidence. I was just hoping to run
into you, too.
What? Really? What’s wrong?

Well, actually... Hee hee... I wanted to
thank you.

Thank me? But why? I haven’t done anything
worth mentioning.

That’s not true! Don’t you remember when
I asked for your advice about Aoi?

Oh, yeah, I remember that. But...what’s that
got to do with anything?

Thanks to you, we’ve been getting along real
well this whole month.
Now we’re totally best friends! Seriously!
Oh. Well, I’m glad to hear that, Saki.
Heheheh. Thanks, Takuma.

(Seeing Saki smile so happily brings a smile
to my face as well.)

(If only I knew what to say in this sort of
situation...)
What should I say to Saki?
So, what happened?
No need to thank me.
So now you’re in love?

So, what exactly happened between you and Aoi
this past month?

Hee hee, you want to know? Well, it was
nothing special, really.

Just the constant struggle to survive, every
hour of every day, sleeping in shifts...
(How is that nothing special?!)

Living like that, day after day... It changes
you.

You just naturally start to trust each other,
instead of snapping at each other.
Saki...

And really, rather than waste time fighting,
it’s better to be honest about how you feel.
Well, no need to thank me.
It’s something you had inside you all along.
You think so?

I do. You being willing to open yourself up
is what gave you all the strength you needed.

Takuma... Ha ha, that’s such a sweet thing to
say... Now I’m blushing.

Still... Heheh, I had it in me all along,
huh?
So now you’re in love?

Oh, I should’ve known you’d take this the
wrong way. Typical Takuma!
Not that I mind, really. You’re not so bad.

Oh, but, uh...don’t get me wrong, I just mean
as a friend.
Heheh, yeah, I know what you meant.

Do you, though? Because I’d hate for you to
have the wrong idea.
*ahem* Anyway...
Thank you. Thanks for coming back.

To tell you the truth, I thought we’d seen
the last of you.
So, thanks.
